page.title: 06FARMERS STORE MOLE VALLEY
page.content: {MOLE VALLEY FARMERS}HAS BEEN THERE FOR 13 YEARS. THEY GET MANY CUSTOMERS MAINLY FARMERS. ABOUT 15 PEOPLE WORK THERE TWO OF WHICH ARE NEW THIS YEAR.THEY HAVE ABOUT 30 TO 40 DELIVERIES A WEEK. THEY SELL A WIDE VARIETY OF FARMING EQUIPMENT, CLOTHES, D.I.Y. EQUIPMENT, ELECTRICAL APPARATUS , PET FOOD AND RECENTLY THEY HAVE STARTED TO SELL FOOD. {GERSTON FARM }WAS VISITED BY SHARON TANCOCK AND TRACEY WHITROW. THEY ASKED THE FARMER MR WEBBER MANY QUESTIONS AND FILLED OUT THE DOMESDAY SURVEY MADE UP BY THE CHILDREN. HE GAVE THESE REPLIES. MY FARM IS MAINLY{BEEF CATTLE ON 90 ACRES OF LAND.HE HAS NO HORSES OR SHEEP. HE IS THE ONLY ONE WORKING ON THE FARM. HE HAS 8 FEILDS HIS CROPS ARE GRASS AND CABBAGES. THE FARM HAS 4 TRACTORS. THE WATER COMES FROM MAINS BUT THE CATTLE DRINK FROM THE RIVER.
